Let $C$ be the class of all real valued continuously differentiable functions $f$ on the interval $0 \leq x \leq 1$ with $f(0)=0$ and $f(1)=1$. Determine the largest real number $u$ such that $u \leq \int_0^1|f'(x)-f(x)|\,dx$ for all $f$ in $C$.

    (C : Set (ℝ → ℝ))

```lean4
theorem putnam_1980_a6
    (C : Set (ℝ → ℝ))
    (hC : C = {f : ℝ → ℝ | ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ f 0 = 0 ∧ f 1 = 1}) :
    IsGreatest
      {(u : ℝ) | ∀ f ∈ C, u ≤ (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|)}
      (1 / Real.exp 1) := by
  have h₁ : (1 / Real.exp 1) ≤ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by rfl
  have h₂ : ∀ f ∈ C, (1 / Real.exp 1) ≤ (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|) := by
    intro f hf
    have h₃ : f 0 = 0 := hf.2.1
    have h₄ : f 1 = 1 := hf.2.2
    have h₅ : ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) := hf.1
    have h₆ : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo (0 : ℝ) 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 0 := by
      intro x hx
      positivity
    have h₇ : (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|) ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
      have h₈ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
        have h₉ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
          have h₁₀ : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo (0 : ℝ) 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
            intro x hx
            have h₁₁ : Real.exp 1 > 0 := Real.exp_pos 1
            have h₁₂ : Real.exp 1 ≠ 0 := by positivity
            have h₁₃ : 1 / Real.exp 1 > 0 := by positivity
            have h₁₄ : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo (0 : ℝ) 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
              intro x hx
              have h₁₅ : deriv f x = f x := by
                apply HasDerivAt.deriv
                have h₁₆ : ContinuousOn f (Set.Icc 0 1) := h₅.continuousOn
                have h₁₇ : DifferentiableOn ℝ f (Set.Ioo 0 1) := h₅.differentiableOn
                have h₁₈ : f x = x := by
                  have h₁₉ : f 0 = 0 := h₃
                  have h₂₀ : f 1 = 1 := h₄
                  have h₂₁ : ContinuousOn f (Set.Icc 0 1) := h₅.continuousOn
                  have h₂₂ : DifferentiableOn ℝ f (Set.Ioo 0 1) := h₅.differentiableOn
                  apply Eq.symm
                  apply Eq.symm
                  -- Use the fact that f is linear and satisfies the boundary conditions
                  linarith [h₂₁ 0 (by norm_num [Set.left_mem_Icc]), h₂₁ 1 (by norm_num [Set.right_mem_Icc]),
                    h₂₂.derivWithin (by norm_num [Set.Ioo_eq_empty_iff]) (by norm_num [Set.Ioo_eq_empty_iff])]
                simp_all
              simp_all
              <;> field_simp [h₁₅, sub_self, abs_of_nonneg, Real.exp_pos]
              <;> rw [le_div_iff (Real.exp_pos 1)]
              <;> nlinarith [Real.add_one_le_exp 1]
            exact h₁₄ x hx
          exact?
        exact h₉
      exact h₈
    exact h₇
  exact ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1980_a6
    (C : Set (ℝ → ℝ))
    (hC : C = {f : ℝ → ℝ | ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ f 0 = 0 ∧ f 1 = 1}) :
    IsGreatest
      {(u : ℝ) | ∀ f ∈ C, u ≤ (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|)}
      putnam_1980_a6_solution := by
  refine' ⟨_, _⟩
  · -- Show that 1 / Real.exp 1 is a member of the set
    intro f hf
    have h₁ : f 0 = 0 := hf.2.1
    have h₂ : f 1 = 1 := hf.2.2
    have h₃ : ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) := hf.1
    have h₄ : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 0 := by
      intro x hx
      exact abs_nonneg _
    have h₅ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 0 := by
      apply integral_nonneg
      intro x hx
      exact h₄ x hx
    have h₆ : Real.exp 1 > 0 := Real.exp_pos 1
    have h₇ : (1 : ℝ) / Real.exp 1 ≤ ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| := by
      have h₈ : (1 : ℝ) / Real.exp 1 ≤ 1 := by
        rw [div_le_iff (by positivity)]
        have : Real.exp 1 ≥ 1 := by nlinarith [Real.add_one_le_exp 1]
        nlinarith
      have h₉ : (1 : ℝ) / Real.exp 1 ≤ ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| := by
        have h₁₀ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 := by
          -- Use the fact that f(x) = x is in C and the integral of |f'(x) - f(x)| over [0,1] is 1
          have h₁₁ : f = fun x => x := by
            funext x
            have h₁₂ : f x = x := by
              have h₁₃ : f 0 = 0 := hf.2.1
              have h₁₄ : f 1 = 1 := hf.2.2
              have h₁₅ : ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) := hf.1
              -- Use the fact that f is in C and the conditions f(0) = 0 and f(1) = 1 to show f(x) = x
              exact
                by
                  have h₁₆ := h₁₅
                  have h₁₇ : f = fun x => x := by
                    ext x
                    have h₁₈ := h₁₅ x (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc] <;> linarith)
                    have h₁₉ := h₁₅ 0 (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc] <;> linarith)
                    have h₂₀ := h₁₅ 1 (by norm_num [Set.mem_Icc] <;> linarith)
                    simp_all [h₁₃, h₁₄]
                    <;> aesop
                  simp_all
            simp_all
          rw [h₁₁]
          simp [Set.Ioo, Real.exp_ne_zero]
          <;> norm_num
          <;> apply le_of_eq
          <;> field_simp
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> norm_num
          <;> apply le_of_eq
          <;> field_simp
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> norm_num
        linarith
      exact h₉
    exact h₇
  · -- Show that 1 / Real.exp 1 is the greatest lower bound
    intro u hu
    have h₁ : u ≤ putnam_1980_a6_solution := by
      simp only [putnam_1980_a6_solution, Set.mem_setOf_eq] at hu ⊢
      have h₂ := hu (fun x => x) (by
        constructor
        · apply ContDiffOn.mono _ (Set.Icc_subset_Icc_left (by norm_num))
          exact contDiffOn_id
        · constructor <;> norm_num)
      simp [Set.Ioo, Real.exp_ne_zero] at h₂
      <;> norm_num at h₂
      <;> linarith
    exact h₁
```

```lean4
    <;>
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1980_a6
    (C : Set (ℝ → ℝ))
    (hC : C = {f : ℝ → ℝ | ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ f 0 = 0 ∧ f 1 = 1}) :
    IsGreatest
      {(u : ℝ) | ∀ f ∈ C, u ≤ (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|)}
      putnam_1980_a6_solution := by
  have step1 : IsGreatest {(u : ℝ) | ∀ f ∈ C, u ≤ (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|)} (1 / Real.exp 1) := by
    have h₁ : (1 / Real.exp 1 : ℝ) ≤ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by linarith
    have h₂ : ∀ f ∈ C, (1 / Real.exp 1 : ℝ) ≤ (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|) := by
      intro f hf
      have h₃ : f ∈ C := hf
      have h₄ : ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) ∧ f 0 = 0 ∧ f 1 = 1 := hC ▸ h₃
      have h₅ : f 0 = 0 := h₄.2.1
      have h₆ : f 1 = 1 := h₄.2.2
      have h₇ : ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) := h₄.1
      have h₈ : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo (0 : ℝ) 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 0 := by
        intro x hx
        positivity
      have h₉ : (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|) ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
        have h₁₀ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
          have h₁₁ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
            have h₁₂ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
              -- Use the fact that the integral of |deriv f x - f x| is bounded below by 1 / exp 1
              have h₁₃ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
                have h₁₄ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
                  -- Use the fact that the integral of |deriv f x - f x| is bounded below by 1 / exp 1
                  have h₁₅ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
                    have h₁₆ : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo (0 : ℝ) 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 0 := by
                      intro x hx
                      positivity
                    have h₁₇ : (1 / Real.exp 1 : ℝ) ≤ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by linarith
                    have h₁₈ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
                      have h₁₉ : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
                        -- Use the fact that the integral of |deriv f x - f x| is bounded below by 1 / exp 1
                        calc
                          (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|) ≥ ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, (1 / Real.exp 1 : ℝ) := by
                            apply?
                          _ = (1 / Real.exp 1 : ℝ) * (1 - 0) := by
                            simp [mul_comm]
                          _ = 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
                            ring
                      exact h₁₉
                    exact h₁₈
                  exact h₁₅
                exact h₁₄
              exact h₁₃
            exact h₁₂
          exact h₁₀
        exact h₁₀
      exact h₉
    have h₃ : IsGreatest {(u : ℝ) | ∀ f ∈ C, u ≤ (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|)} (1 / Real.exp 1) := by
      refine' ⟨by aesop, fun u hu => _⟩
      have h₄ := hu (fun x => x) ⟨?_, by norm_num, by norm_num⟩
      have h₅ : (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv (fun x => x) x - (fun x => x) x|) = 1 / Real.exp 1 := by
```

    (C : Set (ℝ → ℝ))

      {(u : ℝ) | ∀ f ∈ C, u ≤ (∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x|)}

```lean4
    have h1 : f 0 = 0 := hf.2.1
    have h2 : f 1 = 1 := hf.2.2
    have h3 : ContDiffOn ℝ 1 f (Set.Icc 0 1) := hf.1
    have h4 : ∀ x ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 0 := by
      intro x hx
      exact abs_nonneg _
    have h5 : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv f x - f x| ≥ 0 := by
      apply integral_nonneg
      exact h4
    simp_all [putnam_1980_a6_solution]
    <;> norm_num
    <;> linarith
  · intro y hy
    have h1 : y ≤ ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv (fun x => x) x - x| := by
      have h2 : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |deriv (fun x => x) x - x| = ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |1 - x| := by
        congr
        funext x
        simp [deriv_id]
        <;> norm_num
        <;> linarith
      rw [h2]
      have h3 : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |1 - x| = 1 / 2 := by
        -- Use the fact that the integral of |1 - x| over (0, 1) is 1/2
        have h4 : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |1 - x| = 1 / 2 := by
          have h5 : ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |1 - x| = ∫ x in Set.Ioo 0 1, |x - 1| := by
```
